artist: Artist: Max Ernst; Author: René Crevel; Publisher: Louis Broder; Printer: Crommelynck and Dutrou, Paris
description: Illustrated book; binding: paper dustcover, gray cardboard cover guard and slip case; type: Louis Broder (typography); Fequet et Baudier (text)
image_copyright: © Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F ADAGP%2C Paris
medium: Etching from an illustrated book with nine etchings (two with aquatint, one with aquatint and drypoint), two engravings, one aquatint, one drypoint, and one woodcut, letterpress; bound volume
portfolio: From Feuilles éparses, Louis Broder, Paris, 1965
provenance: (Lucien Goldschmidt, Inc. , New York); Bruce B. Dayton, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1983.
signed: Signed in pencil by 11 of the 13 artists
title: Plate (page 55) from Feuilles éparses
